Description:
Step into the future of application innovation with Azure AI and autonomous agents. This session explores how intelligent systems can be designed to sense, decide, and act in ways that unlock new levels of adaptability, efficiency, and impact. From apps to agentic workflows, discover real-world strategies for building scalable AI-powered solutions.
